About Me

Let me tell you some things about me...

BIO

I am a Media Specalists that focuses on Video and Photo Production, Website Development and Social Media Marketing.

IDreamMachine

Intern

As an intern at IDreamMachine I worked very closly with CEO Zeke Zelker and producer Ryan Walsh to create social media content for their radio station, as well as help advertise for their soon to be released movie. I worked heavily in After Effects and Premiere, as well as learned to how to market on social media.

InFocus InDepth

Show Editor

InFocus InDepth is a weekly news show that runs at Bloomsburg University. My job was to make sure everyone had their packages in on time as well as cutting the final show together.

Lube Plus

Creative Director

I currently manage all of the Social Media Content, developed and maintain the website, and control the Production of content that is created for Youtube and Vimeo.
